verses.roman:
divya prasāda pāya nitya jagannātha-mandire
tāhā āni' nitya avaśya dena doṅhākāre

synonyms: divya—first-class; prasāda—prasāda; pāya—gets; nitya—daily; jagannātha-mandire—at the temple of Lord Jagannātha; tāhā āni'-bringing that; nitya—daily; avaśya—certainly; dena—delivers; doṅhākāre—to both of them.
translation: The offerings of prasāda in the temple of Lord Jagannātha were of the highest quality. Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu would bring this prasāda and deliver it to both devotees.
